> 42["world"]

< 40/admin,{"sid":"-G5j-67EZFp-q59rADQM"}       => grant access to the admin namespace
> 42/admin,1["tellme"]                          => Socket.IO "EVENT" packet with acknowledgement
< 461-/admin,1[{"_placeholder":true,"num":0}]   => Socket.IO "BINARY_ACK" packet with a placeholder

< 3                                             => Engine.IO "pong" packet type
> 1                                             => Engine.IO "close" packet type

Post._content:
# Manus ### manus #### [manus.im](https://manus.im/) **ubuntu@sanbox** **Terminal**: execute_command ![](./2025-03-26-14-20-28-image.png) **File Editor**: create_file, edit_file ![](./2025-03-26-14-22-24-image.png) **Browser**: browse_file, view_page(vllm), scroll_up, scroll_down ![](./2025-03-26-17-13-21-image.png) **** , todo.md ![](./2025-03-26-17-14-54-image.png) **** excelagent execute_command(pip instatll dependencies) + write_file(python script) + execute_command(python xxx.py) ![](./2025-03-26-17-28-45-image.png) excel xlsx #### replays [Comprehensive Tesla Stock Analysis and Investment Insights](https://manus.im/share/xFgpHb15vKqfRPWIs3JJPJ?replay=1) [Super Mario Game in Minecraft Style](https://manus.im/share/nrEydgtF8bLZFeDI8mPpUL?replay=1) #### prompt[Manus tools and prompts GitHub](https://gist.github.com/jlia0/db0a9695b3ca7609c9b1a08dcbf872c9) [manus-open(manus sandbox) Github](https://github.com/whit3rabbit/manus-open) [Replay: Check Files Under /opt/.manus Path - Manus](https://manus.im/share/lLR5uWIR5Im3k9FCktVu0k?replay=1) [](https://cn-sec.com/archives/3845527.html) ![](./2025-03-27-14-05-43-image.png) ### [Building Effective AI Agents \ Anthropic Agent](https://www.anthropic.com/engineering/building-effective-agents) #### OpenHands(OpenDevin) [GitHub - All-Hands-AI/OpenHands: OpenHands: Code Less, Make More](https://github.com/All-Hands-AI/OpenHands/tree/main) ![](./2025-03-27-11-34-31-image.png) #### OpenManus [ OpenManus 40k star](https://github.com/mannaandpoem/OpenManus) google_search + browser-use + python exec + subprocess bash + ManusAgent -> ToolCallAgent -> ReActAgent **prompt**Bing model: google/gemini-2.0-pro-exp-02-05 ```json { "messages": [ { "role": "system", "content": "You are OpenManus, an all-capable AI assistant, aimed at solving any task presented by the user. Long tasks: - Keep track of the status and subresults in the memory. 9. Extraction: - If your task is to find information - call extract_content on the specific pages to get and store the information. Your responses must be always JSON with the specified format.
